interface.name: web_bitmapbuf_factory
interface.description:
A singleton global object that provides support for web buffers.
Clients can create wl_buffer objects using the create_buffer request.

request.name: create_buffer
request.description: Create a wl_buffer object by wrapping an HTML bitmap, so it can be used with a surface.
